name: The Warrior of Light and Shadow
name_original: The Warrior of Light and Shadow
description:
"The Warrior of Light and Shadow" is a dungeon-crawler game made for the LuxJam game jam where the theme was Light and Shadow.

In the game you play as a warrior (that looks lika a mage, but don't notice that) that can alternate between two souls (Light and Shadow) . You must destroy all the enemies in the dungeon.

Made in 48h by three friends:

  • Matheus Bencke Nantes Coelho
  • Rudieri Dietrich Bauer
  • Thiago Luiz Watambak

We hope you like it ^^
